attributes.action: Allow weddings of up to 5 people during 2nd Lockdown
attributes.additional_details: Weddings are an important part of life and I believe that people who have arranged and rearranged weddings, and eypople who want to get married now, should be able to do so. It is a necessity.
attributes.background: A lot of people have rescheduled their wedding for late this year without expecting a second lockdown and it has been devistating to find out that we can't get married. I think wedding should be able to go ahead, even if it just consists of the couple, and 2 witnesses.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315627
